original_title: Mein Ek Din Laut Kay Aaoon Ga
overview: A newly married couple Zohiab and Sheeza are coming home after their marriage but Sheeza pushes Zohaib and he falls in a ditch and than everything changes in Zohaib's family until a stranger from Morocco enters the scenario.
title: Mein Ek Din Laut Kay Aaoon Ga
